participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring and traditional, enjoys structured activities and values family.
participant_1.background: my favorite color is red. i am a christian. my sister is a pole dancer. i enjoy listening to classical music. i can drive a tractor.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and laid-back, loves trying new activities and isn't overly concerned with appearances.
participant_2.background: i dance on the weekends. i compete in dog agility classes. i don't care about fashion. i hate the color orange.
